column1: an approach for providing mapping information and route information based on exception information received from various users travelling within a common area is described. a navigation system processes travel information associated with one or more devices for comparison against predetermined route information. the navigation system also determines one or more exceptions based, at least in part, on the comparison. the predetermined route information, mapping information, or a combination thereof it then caused to be updated based, at least in part, on the processing of the one or more exceptions.
